Posts.Content: Hi! My name is Megan and I have recently been diagnosed with breast cancer. I am 23 years old and am wondering if there is anyone else out there around my age. I would really like to talk with someone close to my age about their experience with cancer. Thanks!!!!
Posts.Title: Under 35 with Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Age: 23 Age of diagnosis or time since diagnosis: 23 menopausal or not at diagnosis: non-menopausal Specific type of cancer (adenocarcinoma, ductal carcinoma in situ, lobular carcinoma etc): Invasive (it was outside of the ducts) Markers such as estrogen and progesterone receptor status (ER/PR), her2neu status: ER positive and her2 negative Stage at diagnosis: Stage 1 Treatments: surgery, chemotherapy (if possible with names), radiation, etc: Mastectomy on right side Chemotherapy: A/C and Taxol Radiation (currently receiving) Tamaxafin (when radiation is complete) Please state your question clearly: Wondering if there is anyone out there with breast cancer that is closer to my age.
Posts.Title: Under 35 with Breast Cancer
